metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28463 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
ImageMagick 7.1.0-27 is vulnerable to Buffer Overflow.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-28463` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.13
imagemagick-6-common - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.13
imagemagick-6.q16 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.13
imagemagick-6.q16hdri - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.13
imagemagick-common - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.13
libimage-magick-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.13
libimage-magick-q16-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.13
libimage-magick-q16hdri-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.13
libmagick++-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.13
libmagick++-6.q16-7 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.13
libmagick++-6.q16hdri-7 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.13
libmagickcore-6-arch-config - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.13
libmagickcore-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.13
libmagickcore-6.q16-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.13
libmagickcore-6.q16-3-extra - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.13
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.13
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-3-extra - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.13
libmagickwand-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.13
libmagickwand-6.q16-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.13
libmagickwand-6.q16hdri-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.13
perlmagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.13
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.13').
